    BuildProcessor - Class in dd2480.ciserver

    R

    runBuild(String, String, String) - Method in class dd2480.ciserver.BuildProcessor

    W

    WebhookPayload - Class in dd2480.ciserver
    Parses a GitHub push event webhook payload, extracting the repository URL, branch name, and commit SHA which we need for triggering CI builds.
    WebhookPayload(String) - Constructor for class dd2480.ciserver.WebhookPayload
    Constructs a WebhookPayload by parsing a raw JSON string from a GitHub push event.
